title: News
body: Fractured a vertebra while fleeing to Oslo to receive award Britain previously left the programme following Brexit US President Donald Trump signed a proclamation on Tuesday further restricting the entry of foreign nationals to the United States. Buddhist-majority Bhutan, squeezed between giants India and China, champions a policy of prioritising "Gross National Happiness" over growth. Meanwhile, mourners collapsed in grief Wednesday as they honoured a rabbi slain in the attack The deal could value the artificial intelligence company at over $500 billion Wiles called Vice President JD Vance "conspiracy theorist," tech tycoon Elon Musk "odd duck Crowds spilled out of Sydney's Chabad of Bondi Synagogue to grieve rabbi Eli Schlanger, a father of five killed Sunday evening when gunmen opened fire on a Jewish festival. The latest move brings to nearly 40 the number of countries whose citizens face restrictions in coming to the US US officials are working on a plan for a reorganization of the military requested by Pentagon chief Pete Hegseth that would reduce four-star generals and consolidate some international command centers, the Washington Post reported on Monday.
